name: Abbekerk
author: Will Brouwers
body:
Historie

After arrival of the second trip at Batavia, the Abbekerk sailed on to Canton in China. She arrives here in 1778. On her home bound voyage she arrives 26-5-1779 at Cape town. She leaves for Holland 26-6-1779 never to be seen again.

Beschrijving

Built: Yard: Hoorn, 1772

Aantal opvarenden116
Tonnage850 ton (425 last)

Status

Supposedly found near Scilly isles in the UK.

Referenties

  • Grootboek Abbekerk 1777/78.
    NL-HaNA_1.04.02_14503.
  • Bruijn et al. (eds).
    DAS 7139.2.
  • Open Archives.
    Albert Darlagen, on October 22, 1777 in the service of the Dutch East India Company.
